An expectation is considered to pass when its condition evaluates to `true`. If it evaluates to `false`, it fails instead.

# isPassing

**Instance Property**

Whether the expectation passed or failed.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPassing: Bool
```

## Discussion

An expectation is considered to pass when its condition evaluates to `true`. If it evaluates to `false`, it fails instead.
title: isPassing
